claim_summary: Ark. Code Ann. § 20‑77‑2702 states that the Department of Human Services is authorized to utilize one or more organizations for providing health care services to Medicaid beneficiary populations and establishes a provider‑led organized care system intended to improve quality of care, reduce costs, reduce waste, and operate under federal guidelines【486099342356386†L74-L100】.

source.title: Arkansas Code § 20‑77‑2702 – Legislative intent and purpose of the Medicaid Provider‑Led Organized Care Act
